content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan Mamani, it's great to meet you. Based on our discussion, I'm willing to offer you a rental price of €700 per month. This includes all utilities and other necessary expenses. Would you be interested in renting the apartment for this price?
name: Juan Mamani

content: Yes, I am interested. Can I get a contract?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Of course, I can provide you with a contract. However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease agreement, and would you be able to pay the rent on time each month? Additionally, do you have any questions or concerns regarding the apartment or the rental agreement?
name: Juan Mamani

content: Yes, I am willing to sign a one-year lease agreement, and I will pay the rent on time each month. I have no questions or concerns. I agree to the price of €700 per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Great, I'm glad to hear that you are interested in renting the apartment for €700 per month. I can provide you with a contract that outlines the terms of the rental agreement, including the lease length, rent payments, and any other necessary details. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns before signing the contract.
name: Juan Mamani
